problems.title: Battery Won't Hold Charge
problems.description: Vacuum runs for seconds and dies, or won't charge.
solution_steps: Moosoo batteries are notorious for failing after 6-12 months.

problems.title: Overheating / Motor Stops
problems.description: Vacuum gets hot and turns off.
solution_steps: Wash the HEPA and the metal honeycomb filter.
Replace HEPA if it's dark grey.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the battery on a K17 Cordless Stick Vacuum?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement battery typically costs significantly less than a new $505 vacuum, and extending the life of your Moosoo is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my K17 Cordless Stick Vacuum needs a new battery?
faqs.answer: Common signs include strange noises and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the battery on my K17 Cordless Stick Vacuum myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
